author: Proud of my peeps

review: I want to give Fire TV the benefit of the doubt.  The system has to be reset frequently.  I am not sure if it is my bandwidth or something in the unit.  I have a blue ray in another room and I don't have the problems I have connecting and staying connected with that unit.  The Fire loses audio, not video, but audio.  The video is clear, but it is not fun to have to reset the unit so often.  I hope I can determine what to do to correct this.I contacted the tech people at Amazon.  They determined that the unit was defective.  In one day's time I had a new unit and haven't had any problem since.  Amazon gives the best support and guarantee in the business.  I am completely satisfied with Amazon Fire.
author: Bill

review: This unit really drove home the point of how useless a lot of what cable has to offer really is. Especially when you consider the monthly cost with all of the fees you have to pay for their service. I can watch what I want, when I want, and being a prime member is the icing on the cake. After browsing the various features of the unit, I saw that there was a lot more to it than I realized. Looking forward to really getting into it.
author: Elliott C. Brown

review: I like my Amazon Fire with two major exceptions- the voice recognition works only in the amazon apps- I would have really liked to be able to search YouTube and Netflix with it. I expected that it would search all  location- ok maybe present the amazon options first. The other major problem is that it doesn't have VUDU. I have several of my digital copies on there and I can't watch them with this- very disappointing.
author: Amazon Customer "cvgnick"

review: Really easy to set up and use.  Seamless streaming of amazon movies and tv shows.  Voice remote  is very accurate.  Happy with price -- cyber-Monday deal of $69.  Perfect integration with my amazon prime account. Very pleased with purchase.
author: sprucehen

review: The picture quality is superb to Comcast, and such wide variety of movies. Like being able to set up watchlist so when ready to watch tv easier to find what I want. With Amazon Prime I'll save hundreds a year on cable bill.
author: Laurel Peterson

review: I bought this to replace Apple tv.  What was essential is that it would carry Netflix and allow me access to my movies.I was very disappointed when, after I downloaded the ap, Netflix doesn't work!!  Had I known, I wouldn't have boughtit!  I will keep it a few days and hope for a "fix".  I can't believe Amazon would advertise Netflix and then simply notproduce it. I would have expected a public statement. I hope I don't have to bundle it up and send it back...
author: Von Dollinger

review: WOW! Excellent purchase. Easy to install!  All my favorite movies at my finger tip. The speak function on the remote is to die for.  Will buy this Fire TV again.
